segment.source: This user account will become the site administrator and have complete access to the system. Additional user accounts can be created after installation.
segment.target: Ta uporabniški račun bo postal administrator celotnega spletišča in bo imel dostop do celotnega sistema. Dodani uporabniški računi se lahko naredijo po namestitvi.

segment.source: The encoding to use for data sent to and received from browsers.
segment.target: Kodiranje, ki se uporablja za pošiljanje in prejemanje podatkov iz različnih brskalnikov.

segment.source: The configuration file <tt>config.inc.php</tt> does not exist or is not readable.
segment.target: Nastavitvena datoteka <tt>config.inc.php</tt> ne obstaja ali ni berljiva.

segment.source: To use this option your database system must support remote database creation and your user account must have the appropriate permissions to create new databases. If installation fails with this option selected, manually create the database on your server and run the installer again with this option disabled.
segment.target: Če želite uporabiti to opcijo, mora vaša baza podatkov podpirati oddaljeno ustvarjane baze podatkov, vaš uporabniški račun pa mora imeti ustrezne pravice. Če namestitev s to opcijo ni uspešna, ustvarite bazo podatkov ročno in ponovno zaženite namestitev brez te opcije.

segment.source:
Database drivers listed in brackets do not appear to have the required PHP extension loaded and installation will likely fail if selected.
Any unsupported database drivers listed above are listed solely for academic purposes and are unlikely to work.
segment.target:
Gonilniki za bazo podatkov v oklepajih nimajo potrebne podpore za PHP, zato bo namestitev z njimi najverjetneje neuspešna.
Vsi nepodprti gonilniki za baze podatkov zgoraj so našteti le zaradi akademskih potreb in najverjetneje ne bodo delovali.

segment.source: Leave the hostname blank to connect using domain sockets instead of over TCP/IP. This is not necessary with MySQL, which will automatically use sockets if "localhost" is entered, but is required with some other database servers such as PostgreSQL.
segment.target: Pustite ime gostitelja prazno za povezavo s pomočjo domenske vtičnice namesto TCP/IP-ja. To ni potrebno pri MySQL, ki avtomatsko uporabi vtičnico, če je vpisano "localhost". Je pa potrebno pri nekaterih drugih bazah podatkov, recimo PostgreSQL.

segment.source: A client character set must be selected.
A database driver must be selected.
segment.target: Izbrati morate gonilnik za bazo podatkov.

segment.source: A valid email address for the administrator account is required.
segment.target: Veljaven e-poštni naslov za račun administratorja je obvezen.

segment.source: The directory to be used for storing uploaded files is required.
segment.target: Mapa za shranjevanje naloženih datotek je obvezna.

segment.source: A password for the administrator account is required.
segment.target: Geslo za račun administratorja je obvezno.

segment.source: The administrator passwords do not match.

segment.target: Več vrednosti med seboj ločite z vejicami

segment.source: The administrator username can contain only alphanumeric characters, underscores, and hyphens, and must begin and end with an alphanumeric character.
segment.target: Uporabniško ime administratorja lahko vsebuje samo alfanumerične znake, podčrtaj, pomišljaj in se mora začeti in končati z alfanumeričnim znakom.

segment.source: A username for the administrator account is required.
segment.target: Uporabniško ime za račun administratorja je obvezno.

segment.source: WARNING: Your current version of PHP does not meet the minimum requirements for installation. It is recommended to upgrade to a more recent release of PHP.
segment.target: OPOZORILO: Vaša verzija PHP ne zadostuje minimalnim zahtevam za namestitev. Priporočljivo je, da PHP nadgradite z novejšo verzijo.
Med namestitvijo je prišlo do napak

segment.source: The installation file <tt>dbscripts/xml/install.xml</tt> does not exist or is not readable.
segment.target: Namestitvena datoteka <tt>dbscripts/xml/install.xml</tt> ne obstaja ali ni berljiva.

segment.source: The directory specified for uploaded files does not exist or is not writable.
segment.target: Podana mapa za nalaganje datotek ne obstaja ali vanj ne moremo pisati.

segment.source: Error parsing the database installation file <tt>{$file}</tt>.
segment.target: Napaka pri analiziranju namestitvene datoteke za bazo podatkov <tt>{$file}</tt>.

segment.source: Error parsing the email template file <tt>{$file}</tt>.
segment.target: Napaka pri analizi datoteke s predlogo za emaile <tt>{$file}</tt>.

segment.source: Error parsing the filter configuration file <tt>{$file}</tt>.
segment.target: Napaka pri analizi nastavitvene datoteke filtra <tt>{$file}</tt>.

segment.source: Upgrade unsupported. See docs/UPGRADE-UNSUPPORTED for details.
segment.target: Nadgradnja ni podprta. Za več informacij poglejte v docs/UPGRADE-UNSUPPORTED.

segment.source: A unique identifier used to identify metadata records indexed from this site using the Open Archives Initiative Protocol for Metadata Harvesting.
segment.target: Enoznačen identifikator, ki se uporablja za identifikacijo zapisov metapodatkov pridobljenih na tem spletišču z uporabo Open Archives Initiative protokola za zajemanje metapodatkov.

segment.source: The public files directory does not exist or is not writable.
segment.target: Mapa za javne datoteke ne obstaja ali vanj ne moremo pisati.

segment.source:
1. The following files and directories (and their contents) must be made writable:

  • config.inc.php is writable (optional): {$writable_config}
  • public/ is writable: {$writable_public}
  • cache/ is writable: {$writable_cache}
  • cache/t_cache/ is writable: {$writable_templates_cache}
  • cache/t_compile/ is writable: {$writable_templates_compile}
  • cache/_db is writable: {$writable_db_cache}

2. A directory to store uploaded files must be created and made writable (see "File Settings" below).
segment.target:
1. Nasldenje datoteke in mape (vključno z vsebino) morajo imeti pravico pisanja:

  • config.inc.php omogočeno pisanje (opcijsko): {$writable_config}
  • public/ omogočeno pisanje: {$writable_public}
  • cache/ omogočeno pisanje: {$writable_cache}
  • cache/t_cache/ omogočeno pisanje: {$writable_templates_cache}
  • cache/t_compile/ omogočeno pisanje: {$writable_templates_compile}
  • cache/_db omogočeno pisanje: {$writable_db_cache}

2. Mapa za shranjevanje naloženih datotek mora obstajati in imeti omogočeno pisanje (več v "Nastavitve datotek" spodaj).

segment.source: Your PHP installation does not have the XSL module enabled. Either enable it, or configure the xslt_command parameter in your config.inc.php file.
segment.target: Vaša PHP namestitev nima omogočenega XSL modula. Ali ga vključite ali pa ustrezno konfigurirajte paramer xslt_command v vaši config.inc.php datoteki.

segment.source: Provide a unique site ID and OAI base URL to PKP for statistics and security alert purposes only.
segment.target: Vnesite enolični identifikator spletišča, ki bo hkrati osnova za OAI za PKP, izključno za statistiko in varnostna opozorila.

segment.source: Your server's PHP version is not supported by this software. Double-check the installation requirements in docs/README.
segment.target: Vaš strežnik ima nameščeno verzijo PHP, ki ni podprta. Preverite zahtevane pogoje za namestitev v docs/README.
